Annetta called and said Bruce wasn’t behaving his normal self, wouldn’t eat, and just sat holding his side. He said it hurt really bad so she called me. She didn’t think I needed to leave work early so I didn’t. Lesa came up and we returned the rental.

item.title: Status Update – October 16, 2019
item.description: Got up early, got the kids breakfast, got packed and loaded, and left for home. Rained entire way in Tennessee and the wind was very strong in spots. Could tell it rained in Kentucky as well, but the wind lessened and made first stop just short of Lexington! Ate at Wendy’s, service sucked. Plugged in Batman LEGO Movie. Ran 80-85 mph the entire time I was on an interstate and it really trimmed down our travel time.

item.title: Status Update – October 15, 2019
item.description: Got up earlier, Ashley’s ankle doing better. Went into Pigeon Forge to tour the Titanic Museum. I was worried the kids might get bored but they seemed to enjoy it. I was soured from the start when they made us wait an hour past our reserved time to let a travel club go in front of us. We were given identities that resembled our gender and age. All the kids and Lesa survived, I was killed.

item.title: Status Update – October 14, 2019
item.description: Lazy morning probably cost us a chance at seeing black bears at Cades Cove and definitely left us in traffic on the Loop, however, the views were beautiful, we got to stop halfway around and have lunch at the most beautiful spot in the entire park. It was totally awesome. We stopped at man of the churches and cabins along the way. Ashley sprained her ankle on the steps horsing around with the boys so she slowed things up and limited some of what we could do, started hurting her really bad later in the day and each stop made it stiffen even more.

item.title: Status Update – October 13, 2019
item.description: Lesa woke up to Dillan. I woke up to Lesa, the rest of the kids woke up to me. Ashley’s rash is back – on her back this time. Spent the day in the Smokey Mountain National Park. Started off at the Townsend entrance sign, then some little overlook with a small waterfall in the background. The Sinks were next, it’s kind of a shame the kids couldn’t explore on the rocks and stuff like Lesa and I did the last time we were here but it was also kind of a relief.

item.title: Status Update – October 12, 2019
item.description: Finished packing and loading the truck. Headed for the Smokies. Sonja is pet sitting. Took us 7 hours to get here. Had a decent trip. Kids are driving us crazy and I swore I was going to whip all of them – multiple times – but never did. Got to our place in Townsend, I thought it was a cabin but it was a house instead, really nice place and I have no complaints.

item.title: Status Update – October 11, 2019
item.description: It”s Friday! Took kids to school and headed to work. Should have gotten off at 11:00am because of the time I put in at Atterbury on Wednesday but wound up working until 3:30pm giving me some more comp time. Met Lesa and we went to Budget to get our rental car, a Tahoe SUV. I picked up kids and Lesa fixed supper. Spent the evening getting prepped for tomorrow. Kids are very excited.

item.title: Status Update – October 10, 2019
item.description: Kids glad I got them ready for school this morning, they love Lesa but yesterday was a departure from their normal routine. Dropped them off at school and headed to work. Thought I’d be heading back to Atterbury but not, probably tomorrow. It’s Thursday, which is $5 sushi day at Fresh Tyme, so I got some sushi for lunch. Left at 3:30p and made it just in time for Parent-Teacher Conferences.

item.title: Status Update – October 9, 2019
item.description: Got up at 4am, out by 5am, off to Camp Atterbury to set up, install, and test. Lesa got kids up, fed, ready and off to daycare. Daycare van took them to school. Ashley didn’t have cheerleading practice today, scheduled off last week. Lesa picked up the kids from daycare as well. I was at Camp Atterbury until 5:30pm and didn’t get home until 7:00pm. Everyone glad to see me and I’m glad to be home, Lesa stopped by CVS before picking up kids to get medicine for pin worms and gave each kid their dose.

item.title: Status Update – October 8, 2019
item.description: Dropped kids off at school, left off on time, and picked up kids. Lesa went grocery shopping after work so we beat her home. Kids played outside together and actually got along with each other. They are getting excited about going to the Smokies. Lesa took Girl Scout sales money to Amanda after we got the amount due calculated, I watched the kids and got them all in the shower. Ashley said she had a question, and told me that when she wiped she saw something crawling and she wanted me to look, so I did, and sure enough she had little white worms in her anus, took a sample with tweezers and looked them up, they are called thread or pin worms and can be treated with over-the-counter medicine.

item.title: Status Update – October 7, 2019
item.description: Lesa made Ashley’s lunch since she was in no shape to do so herself, I wrote a note and put it in her lunch. Dropped the kids off at school. Ashley went on a field trip to West Gate and Odon Park, they had a good time, Ashley brought home a solar oven she made. Took the boys to Cub Scouts, a Bedford police officer spoke with Wolves, Dwyane group. He turned on lights but not the siren.

item.title: Status Update – October 6, 2019
item.description: Stayed home from church, everyone utterly exhausted, especially Lesa. Leisurely morning. I picked up Ashley at 12:30p and she was ready to come home. They got wet, no fly on the tent, and when it began raining they just threw the fly on top but the girls had a good time. I took Dillan to his guitar lesson at 2p, Ken revealed to Dillan the top 4, or was it 5, secrets of being a guitar player.

item.title: Status Update – October 5, 2019
item.description: Lesa and I woke up to my 8:00am alarm. Lesa got up, I tried to snooze more but unable. Kids were still asleep! Dogs rushed into Ashley’s room and nuzzled her and she woke up, the boys followed. Even our dogs love the kids! Got the Cub Scout boys ready for selling popcorn, had to get mad and light a fire under them to get them moving. Bruce was his usual grumpy self, complained about everything.

item.title: Status Update – October 4, 2019
item.description: Got Ashley to pack all her cheerleading stuff, took care of animals, and drove kids to school. Thought I was going to get off at noon since I worked last Sunday so I had asked Lesa to go on a date lunch but she couldn’t go so a good thing since I would up having to work anyway, turned my overtime into comp time for upcoming holidays. Got put in charge of the map program at work.

item.title: Status Update – October 3, 2019
item.description: My birthday, 58, an old man and feel it too, text from my dad, kids woke up trying to give me notes and presents, had to ask them to wait until evening during my party. Drove them to school again, called Mr Hudson and talked to him myself, got a good understanding of what happened, just kids being kids and parents (Kensie’s) over-reacting. Lesa sent me chocolates at work for my birthday!

item.title: Status Update – October 2, 2019
item.description: Drove kids to school. Dwyane took a field trip to Spring Mill and had a picnic there, took a hike, visited the Grissom Space Center and played on the playground, according to Dwyane he had a great day. Mr Hudson talked to Kensie and Ashley again! Left a message on the machine but I didn’t get to hear it because Lesa accidentally erased it. Lesa picked up Ashley from cheer practice, then picked up the boys from daycare.

item.title: Status Update – October 1, 2019
item.description: Let boys ride bus, took Ashley to school. Left a message for Mr Hudson to call and fill me in on what actually happened but didn’t return my call. Dillan had rash on his face now, all around his eyes, and he’s been rubbing it, took a look and decided to call doctor for him too, Lesa was able to rearrange her work schedule to take him and then worked from home.

item.title: Status Update – September 30, 2019
item.description: Barely made bus, kids ran to get on, Axsoms started yelling at Ashley. Tried asking what was up but they drove off, I followed, wound up in the parking lot of the liquor store in Oolitic. Axsoms said Ashley shoved Kensie getting on bus, and Kensie said Ashley made her eat paper and has been bullying her. I didn’t see the shoving thing but the bullying did happen last week, and so I told them I’d take care of it.

item.title: Status Update – September 29, 2019
item.description: Took kids to Sunday School and church, Lesa stayed home, Ashley sold lots of Girl Scout candy. After lunch I had to work, everyone decided to go with, kids played in gym on treadmill, elliptical, and with weight machines. Late when we finally left and decided to eat at Asian Pearl. Kids played and watched TV until bedtime.

item.title: Status Update – September 28, 2019
item.description: Ashley’s rash all over her neck, called and made another appointment, suspect it may be biological – like strep or something. Lesa too Dillan to guitar lesson while I toted remaining kids around. Got them a Frosty after the doctor’s visit, then CVS for different meds and a topical cream. Lesa called no to persimmon festival. I spent the afternoon preparing the Greek salad and the souvlaki – dinner was awesome,!

item.title: Status Update – September 27, 2019
item.description: Finally Friday, seemed like a very long week. Kids rode bus. Lesa went grocery shopping, got bulk of my Greek dinner items, I got remaining from Fresh Thyme before picking up the kids up from daycare. Lesa picked up pizza from Papa John’s. Let the kids watch a movie – even Dillan and Ashley. – I ended their grounding early. Made Tzatziki and put in fridge, and made marinade and added chicken breasts and refrigerated as well.

item.title: Status Update – September 26, 2019
item.description: Ashley’s last day taking Prednisone, how her behavior improves and she feels better. Dropped the kids off at school, spent way too much time getting ready and taking care of animals. Work stressful, sucks, not sure where I stand, not sure why they keep me around. Jerry Davis texted and me and kids met him and Michelle at Springville Store so I could pay him for bush hogging new property, chatted awhile, kids said they missed Michelle.

item.title: Status Update – September 25, 2019
item.description: Took kids to bus stop, had to go back home so Ashley could take her pill and to write Dillan an excuse to get into class. Lesa liked her flowers. Long work day, crashed a video encoder at end of the day, almost late picking up boys. Ashley had cheerleader practice, Lesa picked her up. Met the girls up on our new property along with Mike Pearson. We discussed land layout among other things.

item.title: Status Update – September 24, 2019
item.description: Bruce woke me up to let me know Dillan had vomited from the top of the triple bunk bed and it went everywhere. Clean up on aisle 1. Got the rest of the kids up, fed, and ready for school. Lesa worked from home and Dillan went back to sleep. A couple hours later he was good to go. Her flowers got delivered but she wasn’t there. Ashley brought his homework home for him and all the kids had homework of one kind or another.

item.title: Status Update – September 23, 2019
item.description: Ashley’s face better already after just one round of Prednisone. Worked at SAIC all day. Ordered flowers via FTD for Lesa – just because. Grounded Dillan and Ashley from TV for two and one week respectively for fighting with each other. Ashley antagonized Dillan by taking his seat at daycare and Dillan retaliated by hitting and kicking and hurting her. Dillan got two because he was just in the principal’s office last Friday for pretty much the same thing.

item.title: Status Update – September 22, 2019
item.description: Ashley’s face much worse. Church, Junior Church with Ashley, Dwyane and Bruce. Dillan was in sanctuary with Lesa. Ashley sold lots of candy. Got Ashley a doctor appointment right after church so got her there right away, Prednisone alike last time, but this time tablets, and 20mg at that, made her get super hyper and hungry. Picked up a new GS order form from Amanda. Ate lunch at Taco Bell. At home tried to nap, guess I fell asleep for awhile, woke up and heard neighbor riding ATV around our loop again, Dillan and Bruce rode bikes through his yard and messed up his stone border.

item.title: Status Update – September 21, 2019
item.description: Scheduling hell, Lesa had girls day out with Andrea and Bobbie. I was supposed to go fishing and rent boat with Paul and Ross and kids. Ashley had a GS Horseback Riding event. Lesa canceled fishing for me after scheduling fishing for me. Anyway, Ashley woke up with allergic reaction on her face, called doctor, suggested Benadryl, didn’t help like we knew it wouldn’t. Got a plate for the 4Runner, chicken and rabbit feed, and took the kids to lunch at Steak ‘n’ Shake.

item.title: Status Update – September 20, 2019
item.description: Friday, kids rode bus. Drove Suburban, miss is gone, fixed for $56, happy. Worked in Bloomington until 11:00, then drove disk to SAIC, tested and left for the day. Picked up Lesa, and we went to school for Grandparent’s Day. As we walked in Mr Hudson intercepted us and pointed Dillan out sitting in the office, he hit Ashley in the back, and when he was told to stop, he got mad, threw a ball that hit a bucket that hit a girl in the mouth and busted her lip.

item.title: Status Update – September 19, 2019
item.description: Drove 4Runner again. Boys rode bus, I forgot my teeth, Ashley wanted to stay with me when I went back for them, so I dropped her off at school. Delivered disk to SAIC then worked in Bloomington for the remainder of the day – felt wiped out all day long. Lesa drove Ashley to her Girl Scout meeting at Fayetteville Elementary. I tried to get a nap in after dinner but that didn’t happen.

item.title: Status Update – September 18, 2019
item.description: Kids thought it was cool to ride in the 4Runner, they all like it. Bus, work, busy day, had 6 hours overtime last week, would have more this week except I’m taking a half day on Friday. Work is a bear, got home and started working, worked past midnight, Ashley says I get bitchy when I have to work at home and she doesn’t like it. Second night of math with Dillan.

item.title: Status Update – September 17, 2019
item.description: Kids caught bus per usual. Drove the Suburban, it was missing out from the moment I started it, actually worried about getting to work and back and worried about being stuck on side of the road with four kids too. Ashley remembered her GS Candy order form and made some sales at school. Dillan had a really bad grade on his math pretest so I made him rework the entire pretest.

item.title: Status Update – September 16, 2019
item.description: Ashley had bad start to day, couldn’t find her GS order form. Truck had a bad miss when I started it this morning. Got to work okay. Long, rough day. Truck stilling running bad on way to get kids and home. Took Dwyane and Bruce to Cub Scouts, Ashley did her reading homework, Dillan did multiplication flashcards. Started a daily Bible study with Ashley and Lesa and I kind of hope she sticks with it and maybe Dillan join too.

item.title: Status Update – September 15, 2019
item.description: Church, lead deacon in back, security also. After church went to work and picked up Toyota 4-Runner I bought off Todd Davidson. Lesa followed me in Suburban and kids rode with me, they were excited to ride in something new and were amazed at the stick shift. Ashley went to Kaleena’s and Dillan to Gabe’s. Gary Flynn’s son and grandson were riding their motorcycles around our loop, Dillan called them butt holes, whole thing exploded into an argument but sort of smoothed over but not really resolved.

item.title: Status Update – September 14, 2019
item.description: Woke up about 4:00am in tent, took boys to bathroom, went back to sleep until 6:20am. Got up, another parent started stoking fire, I broke out camp stove and started coffee. Wound up making four pots for folks, and scrambling six dozen eggs. Dwyane ate nearly an entire bag of donuts, Bruce ate what he didn’t. Broke camp after breakfast and took boys to Shoot-O-Ree. Their favorite things were fishing rod casting, Marshmallow shooters, and catapults.

item.title: Status Update – September 13, 2019
item.description: Friday the 13th plus a full moon. Worked a full day even though I tried to get out of there to go camping. Lesa tried to help by going into, and leaving, work early. Got pizza from Papa John’s. Smattering of rain in the afternoon but quickly stopped. Jordan sent a link to the finished PAVA photos. Got the kids, packed up the truck, said goodbyes and the boys and me went to camp and the Shoot-O-Ree tomorrow.

item.title: Status Update – September 12, 2019
item.description: We all got up at 5:00a, I had a fasting lab at 7:15a so I needed to drop kids off at daycare and let daycare take them to school. Boys have been helping with chicks, Ashley so-so taking care of rabbits. Lesa rushed to have supper, I rushed to get kids, Ashley had her Girl Scout meeting and they’re selling nuts and candies. Lesa bought some, and then she pestered me and when I didn’t respond as quickly as she thought I should she started crying and accusing me of not loving her, half hour later she was better.

item.title: Status Update – September 11, 2019
item.description: School, work. Mr Hudson called, Bruce got into a fight with a kid on the playground, started out friendly roughhousing that turned into to rough, had to go to his office and again during recess for remainder of the week. Ashley had cheerleader practice, Lesa picked her up, she did a couple of cheers for us. Dillan brought home a 32% on his school work and I got made and lectured him about it.

item.title: Status Update – September 10, 2019
item.description: Normal morning. Worked late again. Picture retake forms came home with Ashley. Picked up kids at last minute. Got gas and went to Dollar General and restocked the candy supply. Lesa had supper ready by the time we got home. Kids rode bikes after dinner but that didn’t last long. Helped Ashley clean out rabbit hutch, then I cleaned the fryers’ coop. All the kids were super hot and sweaty so showers were next.

item.title: Status Update – September 9, 2019
item.description: Normal morning, kids rode bus. Worked half a day in Bloomington and half the day in Bedford. Lesa took Ashley out of school early and took her to the dentist, spacer is okay but tooth is getting loose and will fall out soon. Kept really busy and worked until 4:30. Picked up kids around 5:00pm. After dinner I took boys to their Cub Scout meeting, they did announcements and meeting inside before heading outside to play.

item.title: Status Update – September 8, 2019
item.description: Serving deacon, Dillan and Ashley got Baptism Certificates and Bible Study books from Tonya Johnson and church, visited Nancy Huffman and Gladys Gilland. Ate lunch at Burger King. Dwyane needed new tires and tubes plus an entire wheel since the bearings are blown out so Lesa and I decided we’d make it a Dad and Dwyane outing to Walmart. Inner tubes and wheel alone cost nearly as much as a new bike, plus they didn’t have a wheel, so Dwyane got to pick out a new bike!

item.title: Status Update – September 7, 2019
item.description: Got up early and dressed for our 2019 PAVA photo shoot at Southeastway Park in Indy. Jordan took photos again per tradition. Shot in a different location than the rock this year, took the photos near the pond. The kids did pretty well and then started getting bored of course. Afterward, we had a picnic lunch and let the kids play on the playground. We noticed 456 South westbound lanes were closed so we had to drive through Wanamaker and Greenwood to get back to Highway 37 and home.

item.title: Status Update – September 6, 2019
item.description: Friday! Really rough day for me, stressed at work, entire side buzzed so bad it hurt, it still does. Lesa has most of the Fall Break trip planned, has an Airbnb, and a car rented – a cabin in the Smokey’s and a minivan. Midterms: Dillan As, Bs, Cs and 3 Ds, and an evaluation stating he’s at performing at a 2nd grade level; Ashley As and 2 Bs; ditto for Dwyane and a pleasure to have note; and Bruce no grades but a positive note.

item.title: Status Update – September 5, 2019
item.description: Normal AM. Worked a long day again. Kids got their school photos. Bruce looks so stinking cute except for his face is all mangled from scrapes and cuts. Dwyane’s tooth is crooked and in front of the others giving his this weird kind of smile. Ashley looks exactly like Nicolle, Lesa doesn’t think so much. Dillan looks good and with a decent smile for once. At dinner all the kids tattled on everyone else’s girlfriend/boyfriends – none of them really have one – just teasing each other.

item.title: Status Update – September 4, 2019
item.description: Same morning routine: Dwyane and Bruce big chickens, Ashley rabbits, and me the chicks. Bus on time. Started workday at SAIC and ended at Scientia. Another rough day, afternoon got better. Haven’t had a headache in quite a while but have one now. Lesa texted to let me know highway already backed up, she barely made it in time to get Ashley from cheerleader practice, they learned the Wipeout – whatever that is.

item.title: Status Update – September 3, 2019
item.description: Got kids up, everyone tired per usual, bowl of Fruit Loops for everyone to finish them off. Bruce and Dwyane took care of the big chickens, Ashley her rabbits, and me the fryer chicks, made bus easily. Dillan and Ashley got I-STEP results from last year, Dillan below average, Ashley above. Work was a bear. Left an hour late, construction on highway backed up for miles, had to call Lesa to get kids.

item.title: Status Update – September 2, 2019
item.description: Labor Day, no school, no work. Everyone slept in a little bit. The kids were cracking up when I started reading some of the old kid quotes. Kids very rambunctious and Lesa decided they needed exercise so after lunch we took them to Milwaukee Trail and walked to Wilson Park and back, that solved that. Took them to Jiffy Treat and stopped for milk before heading home. Dillan helped me put away tent.

item.title: Status Update – September 1, 2019
item.description: Woke up to Nerf gun fight in the house. Put a stop to that and started breakfast. Skipped church, everyone up too late, needed the sleep. Dillan and Gabe went to his house around 9, came back half-an-hour later with Gracie. All the kids had fun playing with each other even tough Lesa and I had our fill. They ate lunch with us and we sent them home. We discussed the night with Dillan and Ashley because we really didn’t like some of the behavior we saw.

item.title: Status Update – August 31, 2019
item.description: Took Dillan to guitar lessons, not sure if he’s learning anything but he seems to enjoy going, doesn’t practice much. After lunch we all went with Lesa to get her hair cut at Fantastic Sams in Bedford and then went to Walmart to get Ashley some white tennis shoes for cheerleading. Let the kids get donuts too. Set up the tent for Dillan and Gabe, he’s spending the night. Built a fire, we all joined in on marshmallows and s’mores and hot dogs.

item.title: Status Update – August 30, 2019
item.description: It’s Friday and Labor Day weekend, we get Monday off. Totally missed the bus, dropped kids off at school. Payday Friday, so I bought donuts for the shop per usual. Long, long day! Got off work at 3:00p and even gave them an extra hour. Took long leisurely drive through the countryside to pick up kids, truck started having transmission problems half way there, didn’t want to pull or kick down into lower gear.

item.title: Status Update – August 29, 2019
item.description: Barely made the bus, Kim waited for the kids to get on board. Took an alternate, scenic route to work, highway under construction and down to one lane. Spent most of day doing research. Lesa having her own problems at work. Both of us pretty zoned out by the time we get home. Mrs. Davis texted us, Dillan punched William in the eye and got in trouble for it. I was none to happy!

item.title: Status Update – August 28, 2019
item.description: Better at getting ready this morning, managed to get everything done, made bus easily. Scientia all day, got a crap load done even with build issues. Boys seemed ready to go home when I picked them up. Ashley had cheer practice, issues over her shoes not being good enough, learned movements to last weeks’ cheer, Lesa picked her up at school after practice. Dillan has brought his agenda home last two nights, did okay work for Dillan.

item.title: Status Update – August 27, 2019
item.description: Kids still tired after getting up, missed bus, dropped them off at school. Started workday at SAIC and went to Scientia mid-morning. Picked up kids late, they were making slime and got upset with me for coming so early. Ashley didn’t take care of her rabbits until we got on her. She was having troubles, talked back to us a lot, got emotional a few times. Dillan had multiple meltdowns over doing his homework, cried, and general didn’t want to do it, total drama.

item.title: Status Update – August 26, 2019
item.description: Monday. Rained all night, downpour sprung live trap, fixed chicks tarp in preparation of storms, and still made bus on time. Worked in Bloomington and then SAIC around noon for rest of the day. Got ECT sensor from NAPA, then picked up kids. Kids stuck inside, boys not too bad, Ashley a mess, meltdown on lack of friends, another because Lesa doesn’t love her enough, thinks she gets into trouble for disrespecting when Dillan pees the bed, blah, blah, blah, drama!

item.title: Status Update – August 25, 2019
item.description: Slept in, skipped church, everyone needed the extra rest. Got a young opossum in the live trap; Dillan, Bruce and I released it near Springville Cemetery West. After lunch, we went to Mike Pearson’s to discuss the house, going forward, Lesa is comfortable, more so than me. Kids took A/V ride down to Ken and Cassie’s place, we picked them up there, they were getting A/V rides and checked out a cave on their property.

item.title: Status Update – August 24, 2019
item.description: Woke up to kids screaming and putting their hands on each other – idiot, stupid, butt head, etc. Grounded all of them from screens of all types for entire weekend: no TV, tablets, phones, YouTube on computer, clock on microwave, etc. It was like we sentenced them to hell judging by all the wails, moans and groans we received. Went to Rural King and bought Ashley’s pet play area, would be great for chickens, will be used for rabbits.

item.title: Status Update – August 23, 2019
item.description: Friday, long week! Missed bus taking care of chickens and rabbits but not late, still beat bus riders. Got off and picked up kids early, boys played in mud, Ashley read for 40 minutes per assignment. Lesa grocery shopped. Pizza. Watched Open Season I and II. Kids had a good time.

item.title: Status Update – August 22, 2019
item.description: School and work. Busy day. Rained. Lesa picked up kids, took them to school, Girl Scouts had signup event and Ashley was a part of it. I picked her up. Got home and everyone had ate supper but us! We were only gone 10 minutes. American Ninja Warrior for rest of night. Kids tired!

item.title: Status Update – August 21, 2019
item.description: Chick fine. Texts from Albert, Boy Scout leader, pissing me off. Bus, school, daycare. Long productive work day. Lesa 5 miles on Fitbit by 10a! Ashley’s first day of cheerleading practice, went well, Lesa picked up Ashley. I got boys, then got girls, we ate at Buffalo Wild Wings.

item.title: Status Update – August 20, 2019
item.description: School, work. A chick not well. Stormed. Left early, Lesa and I met with Hoosier Hills about construction loan. Took Dillan to Scouts, says he was bullied, pushed, threatened; not sure what happened, feel like Dillan exaggerated boys being boys; regardless, he doesn’t want to go.

item.title: Status Update – August 19, 2019
item.description: School, work, kids missed bus messing around. Truck running bad. Boys had Cub Scouts, got their books, Ashley went with. Ashley hit Bruce in drive-by, I did same to her, she went into drama mode, maybe she’ll stop? Dillan brought school papers home, had 40% on last spelling test.

item.title: Status Update – August 18, 2019
item.description: Church, kid’s first communion, Dillan spilled on his pants. Lesa took Ashley shopping for white sport bra for cheerleading. After chores Dillan went to Gabe’s, boys tablet time. Ashley unloaded/loaded dishwasher, got tablet too. Kids total asses to each other. Wouldn’t go to bed.

item.title: Status Update – August 17, 2019
item.description: Took Dillan to his first guitar lesson by Ken Tussey, Dillan didn’t offer much feedback. Picked up 6 fryers, fixed up brooder coop, Rural King for supplies. Got a little rain. Dillan played at Gabe’s. Everybody fighting, Lesa and Ashley going at it, I’m the bad guy always. Baths.

item.title: Status Update – August 16, 2019
item.description: Bed trashed my back, too soft. School picture day, kids looked good when they left, except Bruce with his scraped up face. Work okay, glad it’s Friday. Lesa grocery shopped. I picked up kids, got home in time to help carry groceries. Pizza and a movie, watched Avengers, End Game.

item.title: Status Update – August 15, 2019
item.description: New bed okay, we both thought it was hot but slept well. School bus by mere seconds! Worked late, barely got kids in time, no time for Ashley to eat dinner before Lesa drove her to Scouts. Boys played. I picked her up. Told her to take care of rabbits or else, cried, super tired!

item.title: Status Update – August 14, 2019
item.description: Kids had school; Lesa took PTO to clean bedroom; I worked from home. Took delivery of bedroom suite, our first, only took 37 years! Lunch with Lesa at McAlister’s. Helped Lesa rearrange and clean bedroom. Picked up kids. Nothing scheduled, kids spent evening playing, watching TV.

item.title: Status Update – August 13, 2019
item.description: School, work, SAIC again. Got kids early. Started to fix shower drain, needed ‘O’ ring, Lowe’s with kids. Frosties. Finished drain, Dillan went into crawlspace with me, held light. Lesa took Dillan to Boy Scouts. Changed ECT sensor. Got Dillan, mad at me, said no to camp in Ohio.

item.title: Status Update – August 12, 2019
item.description: School, IU, Scientia and SAIC. Truck overheating, put in thermostat, fans not kicking on, will try sensor tomorrow. Located shower drain after trying four places. Took Dwyane and Bruce to Cub Scouts, Ashley went with, Bruce misbehaved. Dillan helped me put deck belt on lawnmower.

item.title: Status Update – August 11, 2019
item.description: Church. I baptized Ashley and Dillan! Praise God! How awesome is that‽ We took Kathy Mitchell and Paul and Andrea Fries to El Ranchero for lunch, we all had a great time! Fantastic Sams for kid haircuts. Bought Lesa bedroom suite/mattress at Living Room Center. Truck overheating.

item.title: Status Update – August 10, 2019
item.description: Kind of slept in, hauled trash, Lowe’s for rabbit playpen materials. Tried fixing leaky shower drain, couldn’t find supplies. Started building playpen with Ashley. Cub Scout End of Summer Pool Party, Ashley invited Emma, thought she would spend night but didn’t. Everyone had fun!

item.title: Status Update – August 9, 2019
item.description: Friday! Everyone tired, even kids. Worked, kids school/daycare. Bruce tried handstand at daycare, wound up face planting, rug burns/scrapes week before school pics. Abraham’s last day, my job just got harder. Pizza and movie, Ashley won but let Bruce pick The Secret Life of Pets.

item.title: Status Update – August 8, 2019
item.description: School, daycare for kids. Work for Lesa and me. Kids obviously tired but handled it well. Fought like cats and dogs at breakfast, made them get down. Mrs Malone texted us to say Ashley is a doll and she enjoys having her in class. Ashley gave us massages. American Ninja Warriors.

item.title: Status Update – August 7, 2019
item.description: School day #2, rode bus, no homework, kids still excited, phone blew up from pics/notes. Took Lesa to lunch at Taste of India, had their buffet, very nice break from hectic work day. Two minutes past cutoff getting kids, no one noticed. Kids chatter boxes talking about their day.

item.title: Status Update – August 6, 2019
item.description: First day of 2019-2020 school year! Rode bus. Bruce 1st, Dwyane 2nd, Ashley 4th, Dillan 5th. Wow! Mrs Willis, Mrs Day, Mrs Malone, Mrs Davis. No homework, teachers/pupils getting to know each other. Little Starr’s. They had good day, could tell they were tired. Rest of us worked.

item.title: Status Update – August 5, 2019
item.description: Daycare, work, Lesa worked from home. She took Ashley and Dwyane to doctor for their physicals, took them to daycare after. Picked kids up, picked Lesa up, headed to school for Teacher Meet and Greet, got info and put up their supplies. Showers all around. Bed earlier than usual.

item.title: Status Update – August 4, 2019
item.description: Family Sunday, kids sang. Went to Bloomington, ate at Cozy Table on 3rd. Went to Kohl’s for school shoes. On Great Clips sign-up list – bumped us anyway – never going back! Lowe’s. Went to barber in Bedford, booked for rest of day. Walmart. Fixed Bruce’s bike. Grilled salmon. TV.

item.title: Status Update – August 3, 2019
item.description: Slept in, kids sitting quietly in living room, first time ever. Ashley bridged from Brownie to Junior, it was nice. Boys rode bikes and played while Lesa and Ashley ordered school cloths. Water main broke. Nicole’s, slaughtered Ken Tussey’s meat chickens. Tacos, TV, showers, bed.

item.title: Status Update – August 2, 2019
item.description: Friday! Work week finally over. Daycare, IU, Scientia. Did nothing after picking up kids, nice not having to rush someplace. Pizza and a movie – not! Kids fighting over seats, and movie, so ate at table with us. Settled enough afterward to watch new Disney movie Dumbo on Blu-Ray.

item.title: Status Update – August 1, 2019
item.description: Caught raccoon in live-trap again. Daycare, Jessica’s pool. Dr Hoff called, no blood in urine, PSA went from 4.6 to 1.6, follow-up January, every 6 months thereafter. It’s great news, on Tuesday I had 5 year expectancy. Lesa took boys to last night of swim lessons, passed, party!
